title: Demoted after winning promo's
body:
So, I won my promo's towards silver 1, and after the game it put me at 0 LP silver 2. When I scrolled over my icon where my names at, it said silver 3. Just wondering if this is an actual bug, if I was actually silver 3 and all of my screens were just wrong before hand? What's up? Don't want to play another 7-14 games just to get something I already achieved. 

Also: every time I try to sign in to submit a ticket, the site signs me out of my account and take me to an account recovery screen.

replies.body: I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary here.  :/  It looks like you seeded in Silver 3 late January, and prompted to Silver 2 today.  I don't see anything that could be preventing you from reaching us through the ticketing center.  You might need to clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or disable some extension that could get in the way.  Otherwise, you can always email us via support@riotgames.com too.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Ok, thank you for the response. I'm guessing my brain was just auto correcting to silver 2 I don't know. I trust you guys just was really confused. Have a good day and tanks agian.
